Package pizzan

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl
    public interface UserService
    User web service This service is used to add customer users or admin user to the app Users can login using their name and password Loging in return a unique string token that is needed to execute most of the api requests Admin can add new admins, delete users and get the list of all users Access point : http://localhost:8080/UserService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addAdmin​(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pass)
      Allows an admin to add another admin
      boolean addUser​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pass)
      Add a customer
      boolean deleteUser​(java.lang.String token, int id)
      Allows an admin to delete a user using this user's id
      User getUser​(java.lang.String token, int id)
      Allows an admin to get a user information
      java.util.List<User> getUsers​(java.lang.String token)
      Allows an admin to get the list of users
      java.lang.String login​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String pass)
      Login a user Return a unique authentification token that is to be used for every request on the api
      boolean logout​(java.lang.String token)
      Logout a user Remove his token from the list of current users token

      • login

        java.lang.String login​(java.lang.String login,
                       java.lang.String pass)
        Login a user Return a unique authentification token that is to be used for every request on the api
        Parameters:
        login - user login
        pass - user password
        Returns:
        a unique 64 char random string;
